== Main Inclusion Report for knetworkmanager ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/k/knetworkmanager, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** As the KDE equivalent of the Gnome nm-applet for networkmanager (already in main), knetworkmanager is target as the future default wireless manager for Kubuntu
 0. ''Security:''
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Not in Debian
** Developed by Novell and included in SLED 10.1
** <nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.novell.com/buglist.cgi?query_format=specific&order=relevance+desc&bug_status=__all__&product=&content=knetworkmanager|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>, and has been reviewed by MOTUs
** Standard cdbs packaging, standard cdbs patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
